entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
